name: LUX-FIX
tag_list: ecommerce, fashion, affiliate, social-commerce, content, blog, uk, europe, luxury, social-gaming, marketing, london, start-up
overview:
LUX FIX works with some of the most exciting established and emerging online British designers to provide the desk-bound with their regular luxury fix.

Not only does LUX FIX curate the most desirable luxury pieces of the moment but, by working directly with the designers to promote their current collections, the platform provides pop-up e-shops offering members exclusive prices not offered anywhere else.
